name: 結華
text:
────あ
ティッシュ入ったままじゃん
trans:
────Ah
There's a tissue left in there.

name: 結華
text: あっぶな……
trans: That was close...

name: 霧子
text:
あ、あのね……！
洗濯もの……────
trans:
H-Hey, so...!
About the laundry...────

name: 霧子
text:
帰ったら……やるから……
置いといてね……
trans:
I'll do mine... when I get back...
So it's okay to leave it there...

name: 結華
text:
え？
ううん、三峰の回すついでだし
trans:
Eh?
It's no problem, I'm just throwing it in with mine.

name: 結華
text:
みんなのも一緒に──
ってあれ、さくやんはもう出ちゃったのか
trans:
So I'll just do everyone's in one go──
Wait, huh? Has Sakuyan left already?

name: 結華
text: じゃあふたりだけでも、ほら──
trans: Then just you two for now, come on──

name: 摩美々
text:
……いいー
自分でやるからぁ
trans:
...It's fine.
I'll do it myself.

name: 結華
text: えー？
trans: Eh?

name: 結華
text:
下宿生活の先輩としては、
ここは頼ってもらえた方が嬉しいんだけどー
trans:
As your senpai when it comes to living alone, I'd be a
lot happier if you'd rely on me for this at least.

name: 霧子
text:
……っ
あの……ううん……頼りっぱなしだし……
trans:
...... 
Umm... no, it's alright... you've been doing a lot for us...

name: 霧子
text:
……お洗濯……
楽しみにしてて……！
trans:
...And I'm... 
looking forward to doing the laundry...!

name: 摩美々
text:
……んー
私もー
trans:
...Uh-huh.
Me tooo.

name: 結華
text:
……！
そ、そうなんだ……？
trans:
......!
I-Is that so...?

name: 結華
text:
楽しみにしてたんじゃあ代われないね
きりりんとまみみんに任せましょう！
trans:
If you're that up for it, then I sure can't take that away.
I'll leave it to you, Kiririn and Mamimin!

name: 結華
text:
──でも、さくやんもふたりも
ここのところ夜も根詰めて勉強してるし
trans:
──But, you and Sakuyan have been pushing
yourselves hard and staying up late to study.

name: 結華
text:
家事だって撮影だって率先してくれてるし、
むしろ三峰にも手伝わせてって感じはあるよ？
trans:
You've been taking the initiative with the housework
and filming too, so don't you think Mitsumine should
be helping out somehow?

name: 霧子
text:
そ、そんな……
結華ちゃんだって──────
trans:
N-No, we couldn't... 
Yuika-chan, you've got─────

name: 摩美々
text:
……
みんな忙しいんだしー
trans: ...Well everyone here's busy, sooo...

name: 摩美々
text: 分担でいいでしょー
trans: ...it's fine if we split up the work, right?

name: 霧子
text:
……
ま、摩美々ちゃん……
trans:
..... 
M-Mamimi-chan...

name: 結華
text:
……そっか！ 
おっけーおっけー！
trans:
.....I see!
Okay, okay!

name: 結華
text:
それじゃあ、お先に恐縮ですが！
急ぎのがあったら、一緒に入れといていいからねー
trans:
Alrighty then, please allow me to do my laundry first!
If there's anything you need washed right away, feel
free to dump it in with mine.

name: 霧子
text:
う、うん……！
ありがとう……
trans:
Y-Yeah...!
Thank you...

name: 霧子
text:
お手伝い……できなくて……
ごめんね…………
trans:
I'm sorry... I can't... 
be of help...

name: 結華
text:
────手伝いはさせてくれないのに
手伝ってくれようとはする……
trans:
─────To think that they won't let me help them,
even when they're the ones trying to help me...

name: 結華
text: アンティーカって感じ……
trans: That's so like L'Antica...

name: 恋鐘
text: ──洗濯終わったと～？
trans: ──You done with your laundry~?

name: 恋鐘
text:
そうめんゆでたとけど、
もう食べれる～？
trans:
I boiled up some somen noodles, but are ya
free to grab a bite now~?

name: 結華
text:
えっ、そうめん！？
食べる食べる！
trans:
Eh, somen!?
I'll eat it, I'll eat it!

name: 恋鐘
text: そいやったら座って～
trans: Then grab a chair and take a seat~

name: 結華
text:
おおー、ほんとにそうめん！
もうそんな季節が来ちゃうかぁ
trans:
Ooh, it really is somen!
It's already that season, huh...

name: 恋鐘
text:
んふふ～！　そう～
ちょっと早かとけど……
trans:
Nhuhu~! That's right~
It's a little early, but...

name: 恋鐘
text:
みょうがもよか時期やし
ば～りうまかよ～
trans:
...myoga is good this season too.
It's reaaal tasty~

name: 恋鐘
text:
は～い、じゃ麦茶と……
薬味と……おべんとの残りのウインナーも
trans:
Heeere, we got some barley tea.. and seasonings...
and some leftover weiners from the bentos.

name: 結華
text: あっ、それもつまみたかったやつ！
trans: Ah, I wanted to snack on those too!

name: 恋鐘＆結華
text: ──いただきまーす
trans: ──Let's dig in!

name: 結華
text:
……ああ……
みょうが、新鮮……夏きそう……
trans:
...Aaah... 
Myoga, so fresh... it feels like summer is coming...

name: 恋鐘
text:
トマトも新鮮やけん……
つゆも……よかやろ～……
trans:
The tomatoes are fresh too... 
And with the dippin' sauce... ain't it great~

name: 結華
text:
うん……うま……
高校組に……ごめんって感じ……
trans:
Yup... tasty... 
I feel sorry... for the high schoolers...

name: 恋鐘
text: また作るばい～……
trans: I'll just make some more~

name: 結華
text: ──……ね、こがたん
trans: ──...Hey, Kogatan.

name: 結華
text: ３人、頑張ってるよね
trans: Those three are going at it hard, don't you think?

name: 結華
text: ……家事もすごい率先してやってくれてるし
trans:
...They've been helping with the housework
proactively too.

name: 結華
text:
夜もよく集まってさ、
勉強してるでしょ
trans: And they've also been gathering at night to study.

name: 恋鐘
text:
うん～！
さっすがみんな優秀やね～！
trans:
Yup~!
They're all model students, aren't they~!

name: 結華
text:
うん、支えるはずが支えられてるっていうか
……でも──
trans:
Yeah, we're supposed to support them but it's like
they're the ones supporting us instead. ...But──

name: 結華
text: あー……えっと……
trans: Ahh... Ummm...

name: 恋鐘
trans: Hmm~?

name: 結華
trans: Hmmmmm...!

name: 恋鐘
text:
言うこと忘れた～？
みょうが食べると物忘れするけんね～
trans:
Didya forget what you're saying~?
They say myoga makes ya forgetful after all~

name: 結華
text:
……！
──あははっ、ううん。忘れてない……！
trans:
......!
──Ahahah, nope. I didn't forget...!

name: 結華
text:
……なんかねぇ……
カメラの前の様子が、いつもと違う気がするんだ
trans:
──It's like...  I feel that they're different from usual
when they're on-camera.

name: 恋鐘
text: ふぇ……
trans: Fweh...

name: 結華
text:
笑いをとりにいってるっていうか
バラエティっぽい盛り上がりを作ろうとしてるっていうか
trans:
Like they're trying to get laughs... or trying to cause
a scene to liven things up variety-show style.

name: 恋鐘
text: ええっ、誰が～！？
trans: Eeh, who is~!?

name: 結華
text:
３人が
……気のせい、ではないと思うんだけど
trans:
All three of them.
...I don't think I'm just imagining things though.

name: 恋鐘
text:
うちは毎日、一緒に勉強しとるな～って
邪魔せんようにせんば～って、思っとったとけど……
trans:
But I just thought that they're only meetin' up to
study together, and that we shouldn't be botherin'
them...

name: 結華
trans: ...Hmmm...

name: 咲耶
text: ────……その通りだよ
trans: ────... That's exactly right.

name: 恋鐘
trans:
Sakuya~!?
What about school~?

name: 咲耶
text:
今日は打ち合わせがあってね
……１限だけで退けたんだ
trans:
I've got a meeting later.
...So I'm just skipping 1st period.

name: 結華
text:
えっ
そんなこと、朝なんにも──
trans:
Eh.
But you didn't say anything this morning──

name: 咲耶
trans: ────I'm deeply sorry...

name: 咲耶
text:
ふたりに気を遣わせないようにと思っての行動が、
どうも……裏目に出てしまうな
trans:
We've been trying to act in a way to not
let you two worry about us, but it appears...
...we've done just the opposite.

name: 咲耶
text: ……少し、話を聞いてくれるかい
trans: ...Would you, listen to what I have to say?

name: 結華
text:
う、うん
それはもちろんだけど！
trans:
Y-Yeah!
That goes without saying!

name: 恋鐘
text: あっ、咲耶もそうめん──
trans: Ah, Sakuya, have some somen──

name: 咲耶
text:
いいんだ、恋鐘……！
……和やかな話題ではないんだ
trans:
It's alright, Kogane...!
...It's not going to be a pleasant topic.

name: 咲耶
text:
──本当は、摩美々と霧子と一緒に
伝えるつもりだったのだけれど……
trans:
──The truth is... Mamimi, Kiriko, and I
were planning to tell you together, but...

name: 咲耶
text:
おそらく私は、
３ポイントのマイナスを出してしまった
trans:
...perhaps I may have...
caused us to obtain three penalty points.

name: 恋鐘
trans: ...Ehh?

name: 咲耶
text:
まだ正式に計上されてはいないようだけれどね
──夜の撮影休止時間にも、カメラを回したんだ
trans:
But they haven't been tallied up officially, it seems.
──During night time when filming has stopped,
we switched the cameras on.

name: 咲耶
text:
面白いシーンが撮れればと──
その一心だったのだけれど
trans:
We were hoping to capture some interesting scenes...
That was our intent, but...

name: 咲耶
text:
……発案は私だ。好ましからざる事態を招いて、申し訳ない
これ以上、ふたりに内緒で勝手なことはしないつもりだ
trans:
...it was my idea. I apologize for causing such an
undesirable outcome. From here on out, I'll avoid
keeping secrets and acting out on my own.

name: 結華
text: さくやん、それってどういう──……
trans: Sakuyan, what do you mean by──...

name: 咲耶
text:
──このブイに、顛末の一部始終が収まっている
摩美々と霧子が帰ってきたら、一緒に観てもらいたい
trans:
──The whole story is recorded on this tape.
I'd like you to watch it with us when Mamimi and
Kiriko return.

name: 恋鐘
text:
──なんがなんか、
いっちょんわからんとけど……
trans:
──I don't understand anything
one way or another, but...

name: 恋鐘
text:
そいやったら、摩美々と霧子の帰るまで
いったん忘れよ～～～！
trans:
...if that's the case, let's forget about all this until
Mamimi and Kiriko come back~~~!

name: 恋鐘
text: はい、おあがり～！
trans: Here, dig in~!

name: 咲耶
trans: ──────Kogane.

name: 恋鐘
text:
みょうがは物忘れさせる食べ物やけん
いったん、た～～んと食べて、た～～んと忘れて！
trans:
Myoga's a food that makes you forget. So for now,
gobble it aaall down and forget about it aaall!

name: 恋鐘
text:
そいで、ふたり帰ってきたら
今のとこからまた再開～～！
trans:
And once the two come back, we'll pick it up right
from the start~~!

name: 結華
text:
待ってこがたん、三峰もおかわりする～！
ね、さくやん！　一緒に夏の先取りしよう！　おいしいよ
trans:
Hold up Kogatan, I want seconds too~!
C'mon, Sakuyan! Let's enjoy summer early!
It tastes great.

name: 恋鐘
text: ずず～っ！
trans: Slurp~!

name: 咲耶
text:
────フフ
ふたりの気持ちは……
trans:
───Hehe.
I don't want to forget...

name: 咲耶
text: 忘れたくないな────
trans: ...both of your feelings.

name: 霧子
text:
『……ふふっ
ティッシュ……！』
trans:
"Fufu...
Tissue...!"

name: 摩美々
text: 『……おばあちゃんて』
trans: "...did she say Grandma?"

name: 咲耶
text:
──という具合に、
数字に挑んでみようと思ったのだけれど……
trans:
──We thought about trying to raise viewership just
like this, but...

name: 咲耶
text:
……
バラエティは難しい……
trans: ...variety shows are another beast entirely.

name: 結華
text: ──っ、ふふっ……！
trans: ───Pfft...! Heehee...!

name: 恋鐘
text: ん……ふふっ……ふふふっ……
trans: Nnh... Huhu... Huhuhu...!

name: 結華
text:
あははははっ……！
待ってこれ……！　お腹痛い……！
trans:
Ahahahahaha...!
Stop it...! My sides...!

name: 結華
text: ねぇ、この涙カウントされないよね！？
trans: Heeey, these tears don't count, right?!

name: 恋鐘
text:
だ、大丈夫ばい～！
まだうるんどるだけやもん～～！
trans:
I-It's fine~!
They're just welling up anyway~~!

name: 咲耶
text: ……ふたりとも────
trans: ...Come on, you two────

name: 結華
text:
いや、ごめんごめん……！
これ、おかしいし、レアだし、可愛いし……──
trans:
Nah, sorry about that...!
This is just, so funny, and so rare, and so cute...──

name: 結華
text: ……それに、ありがたくて
trans: ...and, I feel so grateful for this.

name: 結華
text:
アレでしょ？
こがたんと三峰のプロモになればいいなー的な
trans:
You did it for us, right? You thought this kind of
thing will be good promo for Kogatan and me.

name: 咲耶
trans: ────Yuika...

name: 恋鐘
text: あ～～～そがんこと考えとったとね～～
trans: Ahhhh~ You were thinking that far, huh~

name: 結華
text:
２か月分くらいは
オンエアしてもらえるようにってことでしょ？
trans:
You were trying to get us to stay on air for at
least two months, weren't you?

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ、三峰にはばれるかぁ
trans: Duh, of course Mitsumine would have caught on.

name: 咲耶
text:
…………隠しごとをしようというつもりではなかったんだ
勝手な行動をとったことを謝りたい
trans:
...It's not that we were trying to keep it under wraps.
But I want to apologize again for acting on my own.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふぁ……！
謝るとやったらうちばい～～！
trans:
Whaa...!
I'm the one who should be apologizing~!

name: 結華
text:
こがたーん、『うちら』でしょ
三峰たちこそ、サポートできたらって思ってたのに
trans:
Kogataaan... It's "us" that should be apologizing.
We're at fault too. We only thought about wanting
to help you out...

name: 霧子
text:
とっても……とっても……
支えてもらってるよ……！
trans:
You've really... really...
...helped us a lot already...!

name: 霧子
text:
だから……
真剣……だったの……
trans:
That's why... 
We were... serious about it...

name: 咲耶
text:
……ああ、そうだね
私たちの思いは真剣だ
trans:
...Yes, that's exactly right.
We all feel strongly about this.

name: 咲耶
text:
だからこそ……できるならば諦めたくない
修正して、この後の撮影に生かしたいんだ
trans:
And that's why... If possible, I don't want to
give up on this. We'll revise it, and put this
experience to good use for the rest of shoot.

name: 恋鐘
text: しゅ、修正～？
trans: R-Reviiise~?

name: 咲耶
text:
数字をとることを、諦めたくない
２か月分、なんとしてでもオンエアさせたい
trans:
I don't want to give up on raising our viewership
numbers. I want us to stay on air for the full
two months one way or another.

name: 咲耶
text: これは、摩美々と霧子とも話し合ったことだ
trans:
This is something Mamimi and Kiriko and I have
decided on.

name: 摩美々
text:
……だからまぁ、率直にー
レビューをもらえればいいんでー
trans:
...And with that, weeell...
You can give us honest feedback.

name: 結華
text: ……それなら、もちろん！
trans: ...In that case, of course I will.

name: 結華
text:
──いやまぁ全然、
何か言えるほどの知識があるわけじゃないんだけど……
trans:
──Just a word of caution... It's not like I'm in 
a position to say anything substantial though...

name: 恋鐘
text:
……！　う、うちはもっとなかよ～～！
ば～りおもしろかったけん……
trans:
.....! I-I've got even less~!
I just thought it was a reaaal hoot...

name: 恋鐘
text:
こがんことは結華がいっちばんやけん
……はいっ、結華パ～ス！
trans:
Yuika's the best at this kinda stuff.
...Alright Yuika! The floor is yours!

name: 結華
text:
えっ！？
ちょっ、こがたんそんな──
trans:
Ehh!?
Wait, Kogatan, don't just──

name: 結華
text:
……じゃあ
とりあえず、三峰の感想を言うね────
trans:
Well then...
Anyways, I'll just start with what I think────

name: 結華
text: はーい！　お静かに！
trans: Alriiight! Everyone keep quiet!

name: 結華
text:
努力の甲斐もありまして、
本日！　第１回オンエアにこぎつけました！
trans:
This is the fruit of our hard labor. And today, we've
reached the on-air premiere of the first episode!

name: 恋鐘
text: ど、どこが抜かれとるとやろね……！
trans: I-I wonder which parts they picked out...!

name: 摩美々
text:
まぁ、確認のブイ観るかぎりじゃ
わりとどこつままれてもいい感じじゃないー？
trans:
Well, based on the tapes we've seen for review, it's
fine if they pretty much use whichever part, yeah?

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、かなり幅広い画が撮れてるんじゃないかな
──さぁ、そろそろピザと飲み物を回そうか
trans:
Right, we've managed to get a rather large variety
of footage. ──Now's the time for pizza and drinks.

name: 霧子
text:
ふふっ……
うん……
trans:
Fufu... 
Yeah...

name: 霧子
text:
始まったら……
乾杯……！
trans:
When it starts... 
A toast...!

name: 結華
text: お、SNSもちょっと盛り上がってきてる！
trans: Oh, the socials are getting a little hyped up!

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふぁ～～～！
瞬きせんと観よ～～～～～！
trans:
Hwaa~!
Let's watch without blinking for a second~!

name: 咲耶
text:
さぁ、CMがあけるよ
３、２、１────
trans:
Now, once this commercial ends...
3, 2, 1────

name: 結華
text: 『まず、これね』
trans: "First thing's first. This part here."

name: 結華
text:
『カメラが止まっちゃいかねないような
一種の事故性を目指したんだと思うけど』
trans:
"You were aiming to make the scene unpredictable
to keep cameras rolling, but..."

name: 結華
text: 『事故になっちゃダメ』
trans: "...that's an accident waiting to happen."

name: 結華
text:
『あと、奇跡を起こせるようなゲスト頼みっていうのも
長くは続かないと思う』
trans:
"Next. You won't last for long if you think to rely
on guests to turn things around."

name: 結華
text:
『出演者を自由に泳がせておいて
ツッコミで笑いをとるっていうのも──』
trans:
"Moreover, the part where you're just reacting to
to performers doing their own thing──"

name: 結華
text:
『……芸人さんの領分だと思うんだ
キレのあるツッコミができるわけでもないんだし』
trans:
"...that's out of our scope. It's better left to full-fledged
comedians. It's not like we can make sharp jabs and
punchlines as well as them."

name: 結華
text: 『ボケも……多分、一般受けはしないかなって』
trans:
"And as for playing the fool...
Yeah. Probably won't appeal to many people either."

name: 結華
trans: ...What... the heck...?

name: 結華
